meanings.definition: Of or relating to the space below the base line of a coin or medal.
meanings.sent1: The exergual area of the coin was left blank for engraving.
meanings.sent2: The exergual details on the medal were finely crafted.
meanings.sent3: The exergual space on the coin was so tiny, it could barely fit a tiny ant!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity spilled into the exergual region of the medal, making it unique.
meanings.sent5: The exergual part of the coin was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
